title: General Organic and Biological Chemistry 4th c2014 Raymond txtbk
description:
General, Organic, and Biological Chemistry: An Integrated Approach, 4th Edition (c2014), textbook by Kenneth W. Raymond.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP002535

AUDIENCE: " Students preparing for careers in health-related fields such as nursing, dental hygiene, nutrition, medical technology and occupational therapy. It is also suited for students majoring in other fields where it is important to have an understanding of the basics of chemistry. An integrated approach is employed in which related general chemistry, organic chemistry, and biochemistry topics are presented in adjacent chapters. "

CONTENTS:
---------
1. SCIENCE AND MEASUREMENTS
2. ATOMS AND ELEMENTS
3. COMPOUNDS
4. AN INTRODUCTION TO ORGANIC COMPOUNDS
5. REACTIONS
6. GASES, SOLUTIONS, COLLOIDS, AND SUSPENSIONS
7. ACIDS, BASES, AND EQUILIBRIUM
8. ORGANIC REACTIONS 1 - HYDROCARBONS, CARBOXYLIC ACIDS, AMINES, AND RELATED COMPOUNDS
9. ORGANIC REACTIONS 2 - ALCOHOLS, ETHERS,ALDEHYDES, AND KETONES
10. CARBOHYDRATES
11. LIPIDS AND MEMBRANES
12. PEPTIDES, PROTEINS, AND ENZYMES
13. NUCLEIC ACIDS
14. METABOLISM
(Detailed contents at Wiley website above)

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.
